Starstomp (over the comm):
Let me try, I know another terran language;
Bonjour, je m'appelle Starstomp. Moi et mes amis ne sommes pas des 
ennemis, nous venons t'aider. Est-ce que tu comprends?
I told him we're friends, not enemies and that we wish to help.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> ????::
> 
> The bot did a sudden move and tried to free himself. Niglight 
> said "We can't free him if he continue moving, what can we do? it's 
> seems that he doesn't understand English"
>

a
